page.title: 20 EMPLOYMENT IN KETTERING
page.content: Many people in Kettering are unemployed because of the closing of shoe factories. Also Corby British Steel made men redundant. In the Evening Telegraph we found that there are very few jobs for unqualified people. So many young people who have no job experience cannot get work. Older people too find it difficult to get work these days. Here are some jobs advertised in the Evening Telegraph A qualified artist An experienced sheet metal worker A U.K. sales rep. Personal assistant to sales director Secretary receptionist Skilled motor mechanic Electrician Hair fashion designer Most of the advertisements said that you have to be qualified in some way.
